DOC.brief_summary: The multiple dose study to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of MK-0941 in Japanese patients with Type 2 Diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: MK-0941 Multiple Dose Study in Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (MK-0941-011).
DOC.criteria: Japanese Male or Female between 20 to 65 years of age Diagnosis of Type 2 Diabetes Patient being treated by diet and exercise alone Patient has a history of Type 1 Diabetes Patient is being treated with glaucoma medications Patient has donated blood or participated in another clinical study in the past 12 weeks Patient is a regular user of any illicit drugs or has a history of drug, including alcohol, abuse
